**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** 1 --- While those who appreciate bagpipes may like the sound of this gray reed and black leather instrument, its real purpose is to sow turmoil against a performer's enemies, spreading discord with each note. While playing the bagpipes, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks and to [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks made to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53). **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Bagpipes of Turmoil **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_daze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=61)
  • **1st** [_bane_](/Spells.aspx?ID=18)
Bagpipes of Turmoil (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Price** 460 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **2nd** [_deafness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=62), [_knock_](/Spells.aspx?ID=168), [_shatter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=279)
  • **3rd** [_agonizing despair_](/Spells.aspx?ID=665), [_paralyze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=213)
Bagpipes of Turmoil (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 136 1.1 **Price** 1,900 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The item bonuses are +2.
  • **4th** [_confusion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [_painful vibrations_](/Spells.aspx?ID=964)
  • **5th** [_banishment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=19), [_crushing despair_](/Spells.aspx?ID=57), [_synaptic pulse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=327)
name: Bagpipes of Turmoil
